dcterms:description: The Ninapro first data-set consists of 53 hand, wrist, and finger movements in total, recorded from 27 able-bodied subjects using a MyoBock 13E200-50 system. Each task has 10 repetitions, and the data includes 10-channel surface EMG signals rectified by root mean square and sampled at 100Hz.
dcterms:title: Ninapro first data-set
